```{r "setup", include=FALSE}
require("knitr")
opts_knit$set(root.dir="//uwsp.edu/files/CNR/Projects/MuniDashboard/R Code")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
surveyData<-read.csv("TreeScoreValues.csv",header=TRUE,sep=",")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
reg<-6
ifelse(params$region=="Midwest (Red)",reg<-1,
       ifelse(params$region=="Northeast (Blue)",reg<-2,
              ifelse(params$region=="South (Purple)",reg<-3,
                     ifelse(params$region=="West (Green)",reg<-4,reg<-6))))
```

```{r, include=T}
ifelse("ISA Certified Arborist" %in% params$staffCred,100,0)[1]+ifelse(params$wrtStgPln=='Yes',100,0)+ifelse(ifelse((params$budget/params$pop)>=2,25,0)+ifelse(params$muniOrd=='Yes',25,0)+ifelse(params$trBrd=='Yes',25,0)+ifelse(params$arbDay=='Yes',25,0)==100,100,0)+ifelse(params$award=='Yes',100,0)+ifelse("Hiring preference given to TCIA Accredited Companies" %in% params$contractors,100,0)+ifelse("ANSI Z133 (Arboricultural Safety Standard)" %in% params$standards | "ANSI A300 (Tree Care Standard)" %in% params$standards,100,0)==600

```
